author: Simon Difford
description: Thought to be the original Bamboo recipe with 2 parts dry fino sherry to 1 part rich sweet vermouth (modern recipes are usually equal parts). Balanced and complex, heavier than Bamboo recipes with dry vermouth.
name: Bamboo Cocktail (Stuart's 1904 recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
